Hey developers, this is a project for getting an description on the image which is fed.

This is basically a desktop application made of pyqt5 framework which is a python framework,

the description is generated by the LLM llava which is in ollama hub, i used the smallest of the parameters (7B) since my processor is old you can use anything as per your computational power


prerequisites

download ollama exe 
download the llava LLM model using terminal
procedure
first download the required modules and packages required and paste the code and then create an .spec file https://blog.aaronhktan.com/posts/2018/05/14/pyqt5-pyinstaller-executable
and then make the requiredd changes to the icons names etc and use the command pyinstaller --onefile main.py childModule.py
